DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Evaluate Efficacy Two Different Toothbrushes Plaque Control
DOC.detailed_description: A parallel randomized clinical trial , examiner-blind , conduct involve 56 patient age 15 20 , student CAMP ( Centro de Formação e Integração Social ) , city São Bernardo Campo , state São Paulo , Brazil . Randomization : subject randomly allocate two different group ( A manual toothbrush B sonic toothbrush ) remove urn paper respective group . Silness & Löe Gingival Index , Turesky Modification Quigley Hein Plaque Index Community Periodontal Index evaluate baseline 3 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Subjects generally good health , possess minimum 20 permanent natural teeth , exclude third molar . Subjects exclude fix orthodontic appliance , advance periodontal disease , limited manual dexterity , active caries , medical condition limit salivary function immunological condition , smoker .
